General.Name: Mhethanol Co. Ltd.
General.Description: MH Ethanol Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of alcohol products in South Korea. The company is involved in the golf course business; wastewater treatment activities; and manufacturing of machine equipment. It also offers dry leaf and carbon dioxide. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Masan-si, South Korea.
General.Address: 1120-1 Nae Seo dong, Masan-Si, South Korea
